text:
If I use startOffset="50%" and text-anchor="middle" on textPath, the text is not 
in center of the path! Adobe Plugin shows right, but batik doesn't (squiggle and 
transcoder do the same)!
creator: christian.beer@diron.de

text:
This should be fixed in CVS shortly.  In the future providing a sample SVG file
will ensure that the particular problem you are encountering is fixed.
creator: deweese@apache.org
deweese@apache.org
text:
My original fix was to have textPath ignore absolute x/y attributes, as
I suspect you had a text element with an 'x' attribute that was shifting
the text along the path.  Looking at the specification this is in fact 
correct behavior.  If you have a text element with one child the textPath
then the 'x' attribute from the text will be applied to the first character
of the textPath.

If this was not your problem then please either reopen the bug or create
a new one with a test case.
